00011 ///               class which is responsible for creating new puzzle graph
00012 ///               nodes.

00016 #include "CPuzzleNodeCreator.h"
00017 #include "CPuzzleGraphModel.h"
00018 #include <QtGlobal>
00019 
00020 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00021 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::CPuzzleNodeCreator
00022 ///
00023 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CPuzzleNodeCreator
00024 ///                 class.  It initializes class variables.
00025 /// @pre            None
00026 /// @post           Class variables are initialized.
00027 ///
00028 /// @param canvas:  This is a pointer to the canvas where the nodes will be
00029 ///                 painted to.
00030 ///
00031 /// @limitations    None
00032 ///
00033 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00034 CPuzzleNodeCreator::CPuzzleNodeCreator( QWidget *canvas )
00035 : QObject(canvas)
00036 {
00037     m_canvas = canvas;
00038 
00039     setupActions();
00040     setupMenus();
00041 }
00042

00044 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::~CPuzzleNodeCreator

00049 /// @post         None
00050 ///
00051 /// @limitations  None
00052 ///
00053 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054 CPuzzleNodeCreator::~CPuzzleNodeCreator()
00055 {
00056 }

00058 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00059 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::canvasContextEvent
00060 ///
00061 /// @description   This function executes the context menu event when the user
00062 ///                right clicks on the canvas.
00063 /// @pre           None
00064 /// @post          None
00065 ///
00066 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the context menu event which triggered
00067 ///                this function call.
00068 ///
00069 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the context menu event was used (always
00070 ///                true).
00071 ///
00072 /// @limitations   None
00073 ///
00074 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 bool CPuzzleNodeCreator::canvasContextEvent( QContextMenuEvent *e )
00076 {
00077     m_defaultMenu->exec( e->globalPos() );
00078     return true;
00079 }
00080 
00081 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::newNodeClicked
00083 ///
00084 /// @description  This function adds a new node to the graph where the user
00085 ///               originally clicked to create the context menu event.
00086 /// @pre          The user clicked on the context menu option to create a new
00087 ///               node.
00088 /// @post         A new node is created at the location the user originally
00089 ///               clicked to create the context menu.
00090 ///
00091 /// @limitations  None
00092 ///
00093 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094 void CPuzzleNodeCreator::newNodeClicked()
00095 {
00096     int index = m_model->newNode();
00097     m_model->editNodePosition( index, m_canvas->mapFromGlobal(
00098                                m_defaultMenu->pos() ) );
00099 }
00100 
00101 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00102 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::setModel
00103 ///
00104 /// @description   This function sets the member variable pointer for the model
00105 ///                to the given value.
00106 /// @pre           None
00107 /// @post          The class pointer to the model is updated.
00108 ///
00109 /// @param model:  This is a pointer to the model.
00110 ///
00111 /// @limitations   None
00112 ///
00113 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00114 void CPuzzleNodeCreator::setModel( CPuzzleGraphModel *model )
00115 {
00116     m_model = model;
00117 }
00118 
00119 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00120 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::setupActions
00121 ///
00122 /// @description  This function creates and initializes the QActions used by the
00123 ///               context menu.
00124 /// @pre          None
00125 /// @post         The context menu actions are created and initialized.
00126 ///
00127 /// @limitations  None
00128 ///
00129 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00130 void CPuzzleNodeCreator::setupActions()
00131 {
00132     m_newNodeAction = new QAction( tr( "Add Node Here" ), this );
00133     connect( m_newNodeAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00134              SLOT( newNodeClicked() ) );
00135 }
00136 
00137 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00138 /// CPuzzleNodeCreator::setupMenus
00139 ///
00140 /// @description  This function creates and initializes the context menu.
00141 /// @pre          None
00142 /// @post         The context menu is created and initialized.
00143 ///
00144 /// @limitations  None
00145 ///
00146 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00147 void CPuzzleNodeCreator::setupMenus()
00148 {
00149     m_defaultMenu = new QMenu( "Default menu", m_canvas );
00150     m_defaultMenu->addAction( m_newNodeAction );
00151 }
